content.rendered:
Maple Ave Morning Announcements 

Wednesday May 7, 2025 

Today is a “C” Day 

 

  • Attention Pop Culture Icon Club – we will be meeting today in the Large Group Room. Please let Ms. Schnorr know if you need a late bus pass. 

 

  • Jazz Band Club will rehearse this evening from 6:30-7:30 in the Band room. 

 

  •  Today’s lunch is cheesy breadsticks with Marinara Sauce, breaded broccoli bites and veggies.  

 

Be Safe, Be Respectful, Be responsible and Be KIND! 

 As Always, make it a great day or not… the choice is yours.
